title: Body Elixir
short_description: Nourishing Body Care for Mature Melanated Skin
details:
A rich, restorative body emulsion that deeply hydrates, soothes, and supports the skin's natural barrier — designed specifically for mature, melanated skin.

NFE Body Elixir extends the Layered Care philosophy to your entire body. Formulated to address the unique challenges of mature skin — dryness, crepiness, and barrier fragility — this luxurious formula nourishes from head to toe.

From the same research-driven approach that created Face Elixir, Body Elixir brings sophisticated skincare science to daily body care.
benefits: Deeply hydrates and soothes dry, crepey skin
Reduces the appearance of ashy, dry patches
Layers beautifully with your daily routine
usage:
Daily Ritual:

After showering or bathing, while skin is still slightly damp, apply Body Elixir generously to arms, legs, torso, and any areas prone to dryness. Massage in circular motions until fully absorbed.

Targeted Care:

For extra-dry areas (elbows, knees, heels), apply a second layer and allow to fully absorb before dressing.

Pro Tip: Apply immediately after bathing to lock in moisture while your skin barrier is most receptive.
ingredients_inci:
Key Actives:

  • Ceramides — Strengthens the body's skin barrier
  • Glycerin — Provides deep, lasting hydration
  • Shea Butter — Nourishes and soothes dry skin
  • Jojoba Oil — Mimics skin's natural oils for balanced moisture
  • Botanical Extracts — Antioxidant and soothing properties

Full INCI List:

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

texture_scent_experience:
Texture

A rich, creamy emulsion that spreads easily across large areas without feeling heavy or sticky. The formula absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling soft, supple, and never greasy — even in the driest climates.

Scent

No fragrance or perfume added. The natural botanical extracts provide a subtle, clean note that complements your daily routine without overwhelming.

Experience

Transforms daily body care into a moment of nourishment. The formula works immediately to soothe dryness and continues to support your skin's barrier throughout the day. With consistent use, skin feels smoother, more resilient, and beautifully hydrated.
